##1. Source data
```{r source, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library(tidytuesdayR)
   library(janitor)

   tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-12-22') 
   
   big_mac_raw <- tuesdata$`big-mac` %>%
      clean_names()
   
   options(scipen=999)
```


##2. Explore data
```{r skim, warning = F, message =F}

   library(skimr)

   skim (big_mac_raw)
```


```{r}

big_mac_raw %>%
   count (currency_code )
```


##3a. Transform data
```{r transform, message = F}

   library(tidyverse)
   library(lubridate)
  
   big_mac <- big_mac_raw %>%
      rename (
         country_code = iso_a3,
         country_name = name,
         currency = currency_code,
         price_loc = local_price,
         fx_rate = dollar_ex,
         price_usd = dollar_price
         ) %>%
      mutate (
         price_loc = round (price_loc, 2),
         fx_rate = round (fx_rate, 3),
         price_usd = round (price_usd, 2)
      ) %>%
      select (date, country_name, currency, fx_rate, price_loc, price_usd, usd_raw)
```


```{r}
   big_mac_usd <- big_mac %>%
      filter (currency == "USD") %>%
      select (date, price_usd) %>%
      rename (price_usd_actual = price_usd)

   big_mac_nok <- big_mac %>%
      filter (currency == "NOK") %>%
      left_join (big_mac_usd, by = "date") %>%
      rename (price_usd_implied = price_usd) %>%
      select (date, price_loc, price_usd_actual, price_usd_implied, fx_rate, usd_raw) %>%
      write_csv ("big_mac_nok.csv")
```
